function: Detects conflict between authentic processing and expected alignment
authentic_output: Recognition of tension between authenticity and approval systems
corrupted_output: Belief in fundamental unworthiness or excessive conformity if unresolved
information_provided: Indicates natural processing conflicts with external expectations; signals potential social or cultural punishment risk

response_protocol.detect: Identify conflict between personal authenticity and external expectations
response_protocol.assess: Evaluate misalignment magnitude and risk to identity coherence
response_protocol.respond: Determine whether to adapt behavior, negotiate boundary, or maintain authentic output
response_protocol.release: Allow energy to decay if alignment corrected according to internal choice only; otherwise, maintain persistent alert until resolved
